Simulation Fitting¶

Module for reading and setting parameters in components of an AntennaArray simulation for purpose of fitting.

class aipy.fit.Antenna(x, y, z, beam, phsoff=[, 0.0, 0.0], bp_r=array([, 1], ), bp_i=array([, 0], ), amp=1, pointing=(0.0, 1.5707963267948966, 0), **kwargs)¶

Representation of physical location and beam pattern of individual antenna in array. Adds get_params() and set_params() to amp.Antenna.

get_params(prm_list=[, '*'])¶
Return all fitable parameters in a dictionary.
set_params(prms)¶
Set all parameters from a dictionary.
class aipy.fit.AntennaArray(location, ants, **kwargs)¶

Representation of location and time of observation, and response of array of antennas as function of pointing and frequency. Adds get_params() and set_params() to amp.AntennaArray.

get_params(ant_prms={'*': '*'})¶
Return all fitable parameters in a dictionary.
set_params(prms)¶
Set all parameters from a dictionary.
class aipy.fit.Beam(freqs, **kwargs)¶
Representation of a flat (gain=1) antenna beam pattern.
class aipy.fit.Beam2DGaussian(freqs, xwidth=inf, ywidth=inf)¶

Representation of a 2D Gaussian beam pattern, with default setting for a flat beam.

get_params(prm_list=[, '*'])¶
Return all fitable parameters in a dictionary.
set_params(prms)¶
Set all parameters from a dictionary.
class aipy.fit.BeamAlm(freqs, lmax=8, mmax=8, deg=7, nside=64, coeffs={})¶

Representation of a beam model where each pointing has a response defined as a polynomial in frequency, and the spatial distributions of these coefficients decomposed into spherical harmonics.

get_params(prm_list=[, '*'])¶
Return all fitable parameters in a dictionary.
set_params(prms)¶
Set all parameters from a dictionary.
class aipy.fit.BeamPolynomial(freqs, poly_azfreq=array([[, 0.5]], ))¶

Representation of a gaussian beam model whose width varies with azimuth angle and with frequency.

get_params(prm_list=[, '*'])¶
Return all fitable parameters in a dictionary.
set_params(prms)¶
Set all parameters from a dictionary.
class aipy.fit.RadioFixedBody(ra, dec, name='', epoch=36525.0, jys=0.0, index=-1, mfreq=0.14999999999999999, ionref=(0.0, 0.0), srcshape=(0.0, 0.0, 0.0), **kwargs)¶

Class representing a source at fixed RA,DEC. Adds get_params() and set_params() to amp.RadioFixedBody.

get_params(prm_list=[, '*'])¶
Return all fitable parameters in a dictionary.
set_params(prms)¶
Set all parameters from a dictionary.
class aipy.fit.RadioSpecial(name, jys=0.0, index=-1.0, mfreq=0.14999999999999999, ionref=(0.0, 0.0), srcshape=(0.0, 0.0, 0.0), **kwargs)¶

Class representing moving sources (Sun,Moon,planets). Adds get_params() and set_params() to amp.RadioSpecial.

get_params(prm_list=[, '*'])¶
Return all fitable parameters in a dictionary.
set_params(prms)¶
Set all parameters from a dictionary.
class aipy.fit.SrcCatalog(*srcs, **kwargs)¶

Class for holding a catalog of celestial sources. Adds get_params() and set_params() to amp.SrcCatalog.

get_params(src_prms={'*': '*'})¶
Return all fitable parameters in a dictionary.
set_params(prms)¶
Set all parameters from a dictionary.
aipy.fit.flatten_prms(prms, prm_list=None)¶
Generate list of parameters suitable for passing to fitting algorithm from heirarchical parameter dictionary ‘prms’, along with ‘key_list’ information for reconstructing such a dictionary from a list. ‘prm_list’ is only for recursion.
aipy.fit.print_params(prms, indent='', grad=None)¶
Print nice looking representation of a parameter dictionary.
aipy.fit.reconstruct_prms(prm_list, key_list)¶
Generate a heirarchical parameter dictionary from parameter list (prm_list) and ‘key_list’ information from flatten_prms.
